name: Bridal Tiara by Nia Person
description:
Made to order

Absolutely stunning headpiece made of 4 „flowers“ - genuine vintage glass stones (in NEW condition and real vintage look, made in Germany over 30 years ago!), Japanese and Czech glass seed beads. 
Made carefully and with love.

Dimensions: 4.5 in/11,5 cm, stretches open as needed, silver plated tiara base.

Delivery: 2-4 weeks. Express delivery (1-1.5 weeks) available for some countries. Please contact for details.

BRIDAL SASH 
Handmade bridal sash belt. This sash belt will be great if your wedding color is Ivory, sash is also perfect for Romantic or Vintage inspired wedding as well as magical winter wedding. Petal-y Ivory flower made of premium satin, with amazing crystal center on an Ivory color sash.

DELIVERY 
2 weeks or less. EMS delivery. 
Upon your request, FedEx is available: 2-5 days, price according to destination.

Perfect for the Winter Wedding

Length: 100 in / 250 cm

DELIVERY
2 weeks or less. EMS delivery.
Upon your request, FedEx or DHL, according to destination. Please contact for details and prices.

2 weeks or less. EMS delivery.

name: Bridal Hair Flowers - 2 bobby pins - Ivory by Nia Person
description:
These 2 chiffon hair flowers in Ivory are from my "Luxury weddings" range - in which I use genuine cultured freshwater pearls, gemstone beads, 22K gold or silver plated metal beads and crystals.

Handmade flowers are sewn to bobby pins, which are suitable both for long and most of short hair styles.

LISTING is for 2 BOBBY PINS. Gift-wrapped. 

Larger flower measures ca 2.8 in/7 cm in diameter. 
Smaller flower measures ca 2.2 in/5.5 cm in diameter.
Both embroidered with cultured freshwater pearls and 22K gold plated beads. 
Hand-cut and hand-stitched. 
SEWN to the bobby pin, NO GLUE used.
Nickel free antique brass 2 in/5 cm bobby pin.

Please note, that color may slightly vary - depending on computer monitor.

Every item is handmade and unique, that is why there are no two absolutely identical items. You receive flowers, which are very similar to ones at the picture.

................................
Please contact for custom colors - currently available with Pearls and Silver-plated beads, in following colors: mint, dark navy blue, white, fuchsia pink, sky blue, aqua, turquoise, sand beige, pink, nude, dusty rose, baby pink, purple, orange, coral, peach.

Delivery: 2-4 weeks. Express delivery 1-1.5 weeks available for some countries. Please contact for details.
